FlowHeaterToken
Normal
CheckTokenOverride();
TokenRequested
FullTokenGranted
LimitTokenGranted
NoTokenGranted
Error
1
FuseGroupName != IFlowHeaterTokenConfiguration.FuseGroupName
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.NotifyTopicConfigChange(FuseGroupName); FuseGroupName = IFlowHeaterTokenConfiguration.FuseGroupName;
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.NotifyTopicConfigChange(FuseGroupName); FuseGroupName = IFlowHeaterTokenConfiguration.FuseGroupName;
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.NotifyTopicConfigChange(FuseGroupName); FuseGroupName = IFlowHeaterTokenConfiguration.FuseGroupName;
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.NotifyTopicConfigChange(FuseGroupName); FuseGroupName = IFlowHeaterTokenConfiguration.FuseGroupName;
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.NotifyTopicConfigChange(FuseGroupName); FuseGroupName = IFlowHeaterTokenConfiguration.FuseGroupName;
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.NotifyTopicConfigChange(FuseGroupName); FuseGroupName = IFlowHeaterTokenConfiguration.FuseGroupName;
Go to Normal
2
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequired() == true
Go to TokenRequested
3
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequired() == true && FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsHeatingRequestTimeExceeded() == true
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.ResetHeatingRequest(); CheckTemperature(); CheckFlow();
Go to FullTokenGranted
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.ResetHeatingRequest(); CheckTemperature(); CheckFlow();
Go to LimitTokenGranted
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.ResetHeatingRequest(); CheckTemperature(); CheckFlow();
Go to NoTokenGranted
4
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequired() == true && FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsHeatingRequestTimeExceeded() == false
CheckTemperature(); CheckFlow();
Go to FullTokenGranted
CheckTemperature(); CheckFlow();
Go to LimitTokenGranted
CheckTemperature(); CheckFlow();
Go to NoTokenGranted
5
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequired() == true && FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequestTimeExceeded() == false
Go to TokenRequested
6
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequired() == true && FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequestTimeExceeded() == true && IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.IsConnected == false
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.ResetHeatingRequest();
Go to Normal
7
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequired() == true && FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequestTimeExceeded() == true && IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.IsConnected == true
Go to NoTokenGranted
8
FlowHeaterTokenStateMachine.IsTokenRequired() == false
CheckTemperature(); CheckFlow();
Go to Normal
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.ReturnToken();
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.ReturnToken();
Go to Normal
IFlowHeaterTokenFollower.ReturnToken();
Go to Normal
